name: Labyrinth
description: Avoid the Minotaur's and escape the fiendish maze.

3.description:
Nothing!
There's nothing here.
Perhaps you were imagining things.
Or maybe you werenâ€™t?

4.description:
A Minotaur.
It deftly removes your head with a single blow of a massive double-headed axe.
It takes your head to its lair deep in the centre of the maze, adding it to the large pile of heads it has collected already.
There it waits until the next unfortunate person tempts fate by entering the maze.

1.description:
A Minotaur.
Before you can do anything, the Minotaur tears into your flesh with its teeth and claws!
You feel fear and pain, as your blood drains from your body.
Everything goes black...

3.description:
It's darker and damper here.
Even with the torch, you can barely see anything.
A movement! Yes, definitely a movement.
You ready yourself for combat then...

4.description:
Ok, itâ€™s just your nerves getting the better of you.
A pack of black rats run over your sandaled feet.
A large black rat, with red eyes and long yellow teeth stops to stare at you before it nips your toe.
You kick it away with a shudder.

0.description:
You find yourself in a damp, dark, stone walled hole in the ground.
Rats scurry around your feet.
The stench of Minotaur hangs heavy in the air.
A torch is fixed to the wall to your right. You take it from it's housing.
The torch helps you see better, but casts eerie shadows across the walls.
You would swear some of the shadows are really moving!

1.description:
What was that!!!
You hear something in the dark, but can't tell which direction it came from.
You move the torch around in all directions.
You see nothing.
But, wait! There it is again. A metallic sound, like a piece of metal being scraped along a damp, slimy wall.
You feel uneasy. The hairs on the back of your neck prickle and your heart begins to race.
It could be the dark heightening your senses, or is the stench of Minotaur really getting stronger?

2.description:
You have a feeling you are being watched.
But by whom - or what, and from where?
In the shadows, you think you can hear someone or something moving.
You wave the torch in that direction.
Nothing!
Are you being hunted?

3.description:
You feel almost calm, and - yes, the air seems sweeter here.
Or is that just your imagination playing tricks on you?

1.description:
You feel very uneasy.
The foetid stench of Minotaur is almost overwhelming.
Your mind screams 'Get out! Get out now!!!'
You run...

3.description:
Is that a ray of light you can see?
Which direction should you go? Quickly you decide and then proceed cautiously.

1.description:
Straight into a Minotaur.
It could be the adrenaline fuelled fear or just sheer luck, but you lash out and keep hitting the Minotaur until it stops moving.
You are injured but alive.
The Minotaur is laying on the ground, you can see it's chest rise and fall in jerky shallow movements.
You decide not to hang around. You run away from the Minotaur, faster than youâ€™ve ever run in your life!

3.description:
Congratulations!
You made it out alive and live to tell the tale!
